channel.title: Spending your points!
channel.description:
Well I added a point system a few days ago with javas help, and I want to make it work so when you get 1000 or so you can buy say a sword from a shop. Then after you spend them you lose the points. If you can provide me with this information add my msn or tell me here. Ikili does not allow ppl to 'Reward cash' so sorry there.. I would be very greatful though.
John_95_07@hotmail.com

item.title: Spending your points!
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Noob Slayerz:

Mm, My friend has this! Umm… Ill PM you it when my friends on kk?

Okay thanks very much if he tells you it. I really need this. Over 3 people promised it to me but gave up so far. I am practically on 7hours a day so I should get the pm immediately.

Read full topic

item.title: Spending your points!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

[quote=“Green U, post:16, topic:160067”][quote author=Lonely Boy link=topic=217865.msg1895618#msg1895618 date=1195914009]
Here, I made one for you:

public void checkPKReward() { if(points == 500) { addItem(1038, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); } if(points == 750) { addItem(1040, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); } if(points == 1000) { addItem(1042, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); } if(points == 1500) { addItem(1044, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); } if(points == 2000) { addItem(1046, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); } if(points == 3000) { addItem(1048, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a phat :)"); } if(points == 5000) { addItem(6570, 1); sendMessage("Congratz on getting "+pkpoints+" pk points! Have a FIRE CAPE (H)"); } }

~Musicmad441
[/quote]

Made one? gtfo you stupid geek you just copied that from pimpscape, DIRECTLY from pimpscape[/quote]

Roflmao, not just pimpscape, almost all the servers with the point system… lmao

Read full topic

item.title: Spending your points!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

change the item id in the currency area under the shop method, but only for a certain shop number. add that shop number with the items you want points to be spendable on, then add a new token as the points.

Read full topic

So my question is, how would I make a shop make it require points to buy something and it still takes your points away when you buy something. I don’t want the add Item. I already knew it. :\ ty anyway.
